paragraphs: Hello, I am Smriti Sharma, an aspiring fashion designer hailing from School Of Fashion Technology, Pune. Since my earliest memories, I've been inherently drawn to the world of fashion.

My passion lies in the art of surface embellishments, print design, and silhouette development. With every creation, I strive to infuse the richness of Indian couture, weaving together a tapestry of cultural essence with modern flair.

My designs serve as a canvas for storytelling, each piece intricately crafted to narrate tales of heritage and craftsmanship. I am driven by a deep desire to explore and experiment with various crafts and textiles, constantly pushing the boundaries of creativity.
